Disarming Attack Information

Spend a superiority die to make an attack that deals an additional Ids damage and possibly forces the target to drop the weapons they are holding.

How to Unlock Disarming Attack

Lvl 3 Battle Master (Fighter Subclass) Martial Adept (Feat) grants this feature.

Disarming Attack Tips & Notes
